DONT_HAVE_ACCOUNT: Haven't you registered with the REC yet?
ACORD_WHIT_TEMS: I agree to REC Terms of Use
PRESS_NEXT_TO_ADD: Click Next to add your organization
TO_START_WRITE: To start write your personal data
MAKE_KNOW: Make yourself known and join the REC network
NAME: Name
WHEN_INIT_SESION: When you log in, fill in the public information of your organization and you will appear on the REC map. Make yourself visible and increase your turnover!
ITRODUCE_DNI_TELF: Enter your identity document and the telephone number linked to your username to be able to change your password
HELP_US_VALIDATE_PHONE: Help us validate this action by entering the code sent to
SEND_SMS_U: We have sent you an SMS
INTRODUCE_NEW_PASSWORD: Enter your new password and repeat it to make sure there are no errors
RECHARGE_DESC: Enter the amount of euros you want to convert to REC currency. Remember, € 1 is equal to 1R.
NEXT_CREDIT_CARD: You will introduce the card on the next screen
RECHARGE_OK_DESC: Los RECs estarán en tu cuenta en menos de 10 minutos
FILL_PAY_FORM: Fill in the form and press the Confirm payment button. Remember, € 1 = 1R.
QR_CHARGE_MESSAGE: Request the user to scan the QR code to make the payment
QR_PERMISSION_TITLE: To scan a QR code we need permission to use the camera
QR_PERMISSION_SUBTITLE: We will only use the camera to capture images at the time you decide
QR_HINT: Align the QR code to fill the inside of the frame
CONTACTS_PERMISSION_TITLE: To send money to your friends we need your permission to list your contacts
CONTACTS_PERMISSION_SUBTITLE: No emmagatzemem la informació dels teus contactes en el nostre servidor
ONLY_ONE_ACCOUNT: Only one account was found in the REC, you cannot pay yourself
CREATE_PIN_DESC: To start operating you need to create your REC PIN. Create it now and write it down in a safe place, you will need it in future operations.
RECHARGE_KO_DESC: Sorry, the operation could not be completed. Please try again later, if the error persists contact our support team.
LIMITS_DESC: For legal reasons we need to verify your identity. Send the images listed in "Necessary documents" and we can expand the limits of your account.
SURE_IMAGE_READ: Make sure your image is legible and does not appear blurry
BAD_PHONE: El Telèfon introduït no és valgut
BAD_ID_DOCUMENT: The identity document entered is not valid
BAD_PASSWORD: The password entered is not valid, remember that it must have a minimum of 6 characters
BAD_CIF: The CIF entered is not valid
BAD_MAIL: The email entered is not valid
INTRODUCE_INFO: Enter your personal information here. The cif of your organization is entered in the next step
NOT_REGISTRED: Haven't you registered with the REC yet?
NO_ACORD_TERMS: To continue you must accept the Terms of Use of the REC
ERROR_CODE: Error, el código introducido no es válido
User already in group: The user already belongs to your account
You don't have the necessary permissions: You do not have permissions to do that
UNEXPECTED_SERVER_ERROR: Unexpected error, try again in 5 minutes, if the error persists contact us.
PHONE_VERIFY_OK: Phone verified correctly, you can proceed to login
INTRODUCE_DOCUMENT_AND_PHONE: Enter your identity document and the telephone number linked to your user to proceed to validate your telephone number
PHONE_DESC: Add the tel. of your business
VALIDATE_PHONE: Enter your identity document and the phone number linked to your user to be able to validate your account
LOCATION_PERMISSION_TITLE: In order to show businesses on the map, we need location permissions.
LOCATION_PERMISSION_SUBTITLE: We only use the location while the app is open
QR_PERMISSION_PERMANENTLY_DENIED: Permission permanently denied, to grant permission click on 'Go to settings'. And approve the House permission.
CONTACTS_PERMISSION_PERMANENTLY_DENIED: Permission permanently denied, to grant permission click on 'Go to settings'. And approve the Contacts permission.
LOCATION_PERMISSION_PERMANENTLY_DENIED: Permission permanently denied, to grant permission click on 'Go to settings'. And approve the Location permission.
NO_CONTACTS: No contact available to send RECs
NO_CONTACTS_DESC: If any of your contacts do not appear here, ask them to activate their visibility from their account settings so that they can receive RECs from other users
NO_ACCOUNTS_FOUND: No accounts were found for that search
FILL_CHARGE_FORM: Fill in the form and press the button to generate a QR code. This will be scanned by another user to make the payment. Remember, € 1 = 1R.
BUSSINESS_DESCRIPTION_DESC: Tell your customers what you offer
BUSSINESS_LOCATION_DESC: Locate your business on the Map
BUSSINESS_LOCATION_DESC_LONG: Increase your visibility! Let your potential customers see you, enter the postal address of your business and you will appear on the Map.
BUSSINESS_CONTACT_DESC: Help your clients to contact you
BUSSINESS_SCHEDULE_DESC: Improve your presence and add a schedule
BUSSINESS_OFFERS_DESC: Create new offers and they will appear on the Map
WEBSITE_DESC: Add it if you have a web
PHONE_VALIDATED_OK: Phone validated! You can now log in
MUST_UPDATE_DESC: It is necessary to update the REC application to continue using it, you can do it from the "Update" button, or manually.
RECHARGE_IN_PROGRESS: Processing recharge, please wait until redirected
SAVE_CREDIT_CARD_DESC: Next you will be redirected and we will ask you for your card details to complete the recharge of RECs. Do you want to save your card for future recharges?
SETTINGS_CHANGE_PIN_DESC: It will modify your secret REC code
PERMISSIONS_DESC: You can share the account with other users and assign them a permission that determines what they can do with your account.
REMOVE_USER_DESC: Are you sure you want to remove this user from your account?
NO_MORE_ACCOUNTS: You do not have access to more accounts, you can create one by clicking 'Add another account'
LTAB_INITIAL_BANNER_TITLE: PARTICIPATE IN THE LI TOCA AL BARRI CAMPAIGN
ENTER_CAMPAIGN_TITLE: RECEIVE A 15% BONUS ON RECS ON YOUR PURCHASES!
ENTER_CAMPAIGN_DESC: making a first recharge of minimum {{min}} R (max. {{max}} R) and accepting the conditions of use.
CAMPAIGN_NOT_REACH_MIN: It does not reach the minimum ({{min}} R) to enter the campaign
CAMPAIGN_WELCOME_DESC: You will receive a 15% discount on your purchases from businesses that are part of the campaign
REWARD_OBTAINED_DESC: {{amount}} R are on their way to your account LI TOCA AL BARRI
CREATE_ACCOUNT_DESC: Add a new account to your user
PAYMENT_SHARE_MESSAGE: Hi! 👋 I am {{account}}, we have pending the payment “{{concept}}” with an amount of {{amount}} R. Click on the link and open it with the app. of the REC. 📲 Thank you! {{link}}
IMAGE_PUBLIC_DESC: Cover image, shown on the map!
LTAB_REWARD: Bonus purchase in campaign Li Toca Al Barri
SETTINGS_NOT_AVAILABLE: Settings not available for this account
KYC max_out limit has been reached: You have reached the maximum sending limit
INTRODUCE_TO_UNLOCK: Introduce tu documento de identidad y el teléfono vinculado a tu suuario para que podamos indentificarte y desbloquear tu usuario
UNLOCK_USER_SUCCES: User unlocked, you can now login
WRONG_PHONE_DNI: The combination of user and phone is not correct
PUBLISH_OFFER_DESC: Add an offer to your Map card
DELETE_OFFER_DESC: Are you sure you want to delete this offer? There is no way back
OFFER_IMAGE_DESC: This image will be displayed together with the rest of the offer information
WHAT_TO_DO_WITH_OFFER: What do you want to do with the offer?
ERROR_PHONE_MUST_START_WITH: The phone number must start with 6 or 7
ERROR_PHONE_BAD_CHARACTERS: Incorrect number or contains illegal characters
WALLET_SHOW_BALANCE_TOOLTIP: Press this button to hide / show your balance
